definition: Emperor Shang of Tang, reign name of fifth Tang emperor Li Chongmao 李重茂[Li3 Chong2 mao4] (c. 695-715), reigned 710
River Elegy, influential 1988 CCTV documentary series, said to have stimulated the Beijing Spring democracy movement of 1980s

sentences.english: Though fortune does be pleasing I 'll go along with you.
sentences.chinese: 我心伤悲，命运弄人，与汝同殇。

sentences.english: Again, it is whom that makes the deep affection die away?
sentences.chinese: 又是谁把一腔情深舞落成殇？

sentences.english: I embroidered pillow, quilt with incense, with tears of deep dream.
sentences.chinese: 殇绣枕，怨香衾，梦痕同泪深。

sentences.english: Is the love from the war, scattered in the summer rain.
sentences.chinese: 是爱的离殇，疏落了夏日的烟雨。

sentences.english: Using long blade clasped my acs lag.
sentences.chinese: 用长刃的殇葬送我的英华。

definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
late at night/in the dead of night
the other end of the world/a faraway place
